body: Be yourself, everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

body: A quitter never wins and a winner never quits.
author: Napoleon Hill

body: Storms make trees take deeper roots.
author: Dolly Parton

body: Everything is hard before it is easy.
author: Goethe

body: If your dreams dont't scare you, they are too small.
author: Richard Branson
